classification: Textiles; Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top panel--horizontal faded pieces; bottom part--embroidered in diamond pattern in predominatly red with purple, green, gold, pink; vertical side embroidery in purple, red and green; bottom edge and part of top bound in black; center of bottom panel has insert on lavender fabric with pink loped design; fully lined; bottom center edge has three tucks. Surface ornamentation
title: Baby Carrier
